section items.name: Seafood Combo
section items.description: A delightful mix of shrimp, squid, mussel, striper fish and scallop stir fried in a special sauce and Thai spices. Served with fried rice

section items.name: BBQ Ribs Combo
section items.description: Four pieces of juicy BBQ pork ribs served with fried rice topped with bbq shrimp.

section items.name: Satay Combo
section items.description: Six skewers of marinated lean chicken or beef with Thai spices, grilled and served with fried rice topped with bbq shrimp.

section items.name: Crispy Garlic Fish Fillet
section items.description: Lightly breaded striper fish fillet served with stir fried pineapple, cucumber, bell pepper, tomatoes, celery, carrot, and onion in sweet and sour sauce. Served with fried rice.

section items.name: Orange Chicken
section items.description: Crispy white meat chicken with fresh orange sauce. Served with white rice.

section items.name: BBQ Pork Ribs
section items.description: Four slide-off-the-bone BBQ pork ribs served with house special sweet chili sauce.

section items.name: BBQ Trio
section items.description: Combination of bbq chicken wings, bbq pork ribs and beef satay, served with house special sweet chili sauce.

section items.description: Meat sauteed with chili,onion,bamboo shoots,garlic, bell pepper and basil leaves.

section items.name: Cashew Nut

section items.name: Broccoli
section items.description: Meat sautéed with broccoli and carrot in oyster sauce

section items.name: Pad Thai
section items.description: Stir fried Thai rice noodles with egg, green onion, and bean sprouts. served with crushed peanuts.

section items.name: Thai Pasta
section items.description: Stir fried yakisoba noodles with fresh chili, onion, bell pepper, broccoli, tomato, and basil leaves.

section items.name: Pad See Ew
section items.description: Stir fried flat rice noodles with egg and broccoli in sweet black soy sauce.

section items.name: Chow Mein
section items.description: Stir fried yakisoba noodles with assorted vegetables.

section items.name: Pad Kee Mao
section items.description: Stir fried flat rice noodles with spicy Thai chili, bell pepper, tomato, onion, broccoli and basil leaves.

section items.name: Potstickers
section items.description: Chicken and vegetables crispy potstickers served with a mildly spiced sweet soy sauce.

section items.name: Satay
section items.description: Marinated lean meat with Thai spices, grilled on skewers, served with peanut sauce and sweet chili sauce.

section items.name: Crispy Tofu
section items.description: Served with sweet chili sauce

section items.name: Thai Garlic Chicken Wings
section items.description: Golden fried crispy chicken wings with garlic and black pepper. Served with sweet chili sauce. (9 pieces)

section items.name: Party Wings
section items.description: 9 pieces of wings. Choose only one flavor per order.

section items.name: Cream Cheese Wonton
section items.description: Served with sweet chili sauce. Contains dairy product.

section items.name: Egg Roll
section items.description: Golden deep fried egg rolls stuffed with glass noodles, cabbage and carrot. Served with sweet chili sauce. (Vegetarian)

section items.name: Yellow Curry
section items.description: Creamy coconut milk and potatoes seasoned with cumin, coriander, turmeric, garlic and lemongrass.

section items.name: Green Curry

section items.name: Panang Curry
section items.description: Creamy coconut milk, carrot and bell peppers seasoned with dried chili peppers, coriander root and cumin.

section items.name: Thai Fried Rice
section items.description: Choice of meat stir fired with rice, onion, tomato and egg.

section items.name: Crab Fried Rice
section items.description: Fried rice with scrambled egg, real crab meat, tomato, and onion.

section items.name: Spicy Fried Rice
section items.description: Vegetarian fried rice with Thai chili, basil leaves, onion, bell pepper, and mixed vegetables.

section items.name: Pineapple Fried Rice

section items.name: Dumpling Soup

section items.name: Tom Kha
section items.description: Hot & sour soup with fresh coconut milk, seasoned with lemon grass, lime juice, fresh chili, galangal and mushrooms. Choice of shrimps, chicken or vegetables.

section items.name: Chicken Salad
section items.description: Grilled chicken, cashew nuts and fresh mixed greens with chili lime dressing.

section items.name: Garden Salad

section items.name: Beef Salad

disclaimer:
We are a family style restaurant. Dishes are served when they are ready, in no particular order. We recommend you order to share. So everyone can enjoy the meal at the same time:)

* Automatic 18% gratuities is applied to a party of 6 or more.
* We reserve the right to refuse service.
* Maximum 4 credit card split per table.

sections.section details:
Rice is not included with wok fried trays, please order separately.
All tray orders must be ordered at least 6 hours in advance for same day delivery or pick- up.If you'd like to have your order ready in the morning or lunch time, it must be ordered at least one 24 hours in advance.
